reviews.text: We had paid for a gold quality room so that may make a difference.,because it was gold quality,everything was modern and updated.The kitchen was 1st class and the bedrooms were nice with each having nice flatscreens.The living room had a fireplace and if needed a sofa bed.Close to the condos is a large and awesome hottub surrounded with boulders.Right up some steps is the mall and you can ride a gondola to the base for ski school or rentals and lift tickets.You can also pull your vehicle up close to your condo to load or unload.This place makes everything easy.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.text: My family of 4 stayed at a Terracehouse condo (unit 55) for our annual ski vacation 12/10 thru 12/17. This is the second time we have booked at the Terracehouse and I feel that units vary between modest/basic to very updated and upgraded. We were lucky this time and ended up at a third floor unit completely renovated with granite throughout and great furniture and decor pieces, as well as washer/ dryer in unit (the previous year our unit did not have one). My children (boys ages 5,6) loved the rustic bunk bed in their room. At first we were a little put off for being on the third floor and having to lug baggage, ski equipment, grocery bags... but, the high vaulted ceilings and beautiful views of the slopes certainly outweighed the inconvenience of walking up and down the stairs. After the first couple of days we even welcomed the exercise and it became our "warm up"session before hitting the slopes : )
reviews.title: Excellent Condo

reviews.text: We didn't exactly experience ski in/ski out conditions due to the lower than average snowfall (meaning no snow at all on the floor) but the walk was very easy and even the little ones didn't complain about taking their own skis to the slopes.
reviews.title: Nothing Spectacular

reviews.text: The Terracehouse hot tub is very large and cute with stones and little waterfalls. We also enjoyed the Stonebridge facilities for lockers and the larger pool. Both were very close to the condo.
reviews.title: Great location, hot tub, pool and very nice condo!

reviews.text: I certainly recommend the Terracehouse, especially unit 55.
reviews.title: Terracehouse - a great choice
